mapper.update: UPDATE (SELECT T1.BLD_CD AS BEFORE_BLD_CD , T2.BLD_CD , T1.ADR_USE_YN AS BEFORE_ADR_USE_YN , T2.ADR_USE_YN FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T1 , TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T2 WHERE T1.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYYMM') AND T2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.ADR_USE_YN = 'Y' AND T1.WARE_NO = T2.WARE_NO )U1 SET U1.BLD_CD = U1.BEFORE_BLD_CD , U1.ADR_USE_YN = U1.BEFORE_ADR_USE_YN
